mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_COMMENT, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_TYPE, ORDINAL_POSITION columnSort, if(COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI', 1, 0) isPk, if(IS_NULLABLE = 'NO', 1, 0) isRequired, if(COLUMN_DEFAULT is null, 0, 1) isDefaultValue from information_schema.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database()) and TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} order by ORDINAL_POSITION
select * from generator_column where table_name = #{tableName} order by column_sort
